title: 25 Years of Stories: All About Perspective
description:
This week, we’re going to keep pretty quiet about the theme. This episode is hosted by Phyllis Bowdwin.

Host: Phyllis Bowdwin

Storytellers: Cathy Gasiorowicz, Janet Clarke:
itunes:subtitle: Stories about the same event, from two different perspectives.
itunes:author: The Moth
